languages.text: "Он не хотел уцелеть. Но надеялся убить. Немезит превратил своего приемного отца в клинок, нацеленный в Домин. Так же, как когда-то Адальберт превратил в оружие самого Немезита. Их обоих не страшили жертвы".

"He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."
languages.original_text: "Он не хотел уцелеть. Но надеялся убить. Немезит превратил своего приемного отца в клинок, нацеленный в Домин. Так же, как когда-то Адальберт превратил в оружие самого Немезита. Их обоих не страшили жертвы".

traits.locale_text: "He did not want to survive, he was hoping to kill. Nemesite had turned his adoptive father into a blade pointed at Enim's throat just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared sacrifice."

"He did not want to survive, he was hoping to kill. Nemesite had turned his adoptive father into a blade pointed at Enim's throat just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared sacrifice."

"He did not want to survive, he wanted to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at Enim's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

"He did not want to survive, he wanted to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at Enim's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

"He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

"He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

languages.text: "Er wollte nicht überleben. Er wollte nur töten. Nemesit hat seinen Adoptivvater in eine Klinge verwandelt, die auf die Kehle {mf|des|der} Domin gerichtet war, genau wie Adalbert selbst Nemesit einst zu einer Waffe machte. Beide hatten keine Angst vor dem Tod."
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

traits.locale_text: "Er wollte nicht überleben. Er wollte nur töten. Nemesit hat seinen Adoptivvater in eine Klinge verwandelt, die auf die Kehle {mf|des|der} Domin gerichtet war, genau wie Adalbert selbst Nemesit einst zu einer Waffe machte. Beide hatten keine Angst vor dem Tod."

"Er wollte nicht überleben. Seine einzige Hoffnung war, zu töten. Nemesit hat seinen Adoptivvater in eine Klinge verwandelt, die direkt auf die Kehle des Enim zielte, genau wie Adalbert selbst einst Nemesit in eine Waffe verwandelt hat. Keiner von beiden fürchtete den Tod."

languages.text: «No pretendía sobrevivir. Su única esperanza era matar. Nemesitio logró convertir a su padre adoptivo en un arma apuntada directamente a la garganta del Domin, igual que el propio Adalbert convirtió una vez a Nemesitio en arma. Ninguno de los dos temía a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

traits.locale_text: «No pretendía sobrevivir. Su única esperanza era matar. Nemesitio logró convertir a su padre adoptivo en un arma apuntada directamente a la garganta del Domin, igual que el propio Adalbert convirtió una vez a Nemesitio en arma. Ninguno de los dos temía a la muerte».

«No pretendía sobrevivir. Su única esperanza era matar. Nemesitio logró convertir a su padre adoptivo en un arma apuntada directamente a la garganta del Enim, igual que el propio Adalbert convirtió una vez a Nemesitio en arma. Ninguno de los dos temía a la muerte».

languages.text: 「彼は生き延びる気はなかったわ。唯一の希みは殺すこと。アダルバート自身がかつてネメサイトを武器に変えたように、ネメサイトは養父をドミンの喉元を刺す刃に変えることに成功したの。二人とも死を恐れていなかったわ」
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は生き延びる気はなかったわ。唯一の希みは殺すこと。アダルバート自身がかつてネメサイトを武器に変えたように、ネメサイトは養父をエニムの喉元を刺す刃に変えることに成功したの。二人とも死を恐れていなかったわ」

languages.text: “他根本没想活下来，他唯一的渴望就是杀戮。涅墨斯特成功地把他的养父变成了直指敌人喉咙的利刃，就像阿达伯特也亲手将涅墨斯特变成了活生生的武器一样。他们两个都不惧死亡。”
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

traits.locale_text: “他根本没想活下来，他唯一的渴望就是杀戮。涅墨斯特成功地把他的养父变成了直指敌人喉咙的利刃，就像阿达伯特也亲手将涅墨斯特变成了活生生的武器一样。他们两个都不惧死亡。”
“他根本没想活下来，他唯一的渴望就是杀戮。涅墨斯特成功地把他的养父变成了直指敌人喉咙的利刃，就像阿达伯特也亲手将涅墨斯特变成了活生生的武器一样。他们两个都不惧死亡。”

languages.text: « Il n'avait que faire de survivre. Son seul et unique objectif était de tuer. Némésite a réussi à transformer son père adoptif en lame braquée sur la gorge {mf|du|de la} Domin, tout comme Adalbert avant lui avait fait de son fils une arme. Ni l'un ni l'autre n'ont jamais eu peur de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'avait que faire de survivre. Son seul et unique objectif était de tuer. Némésite a réussi à transformer son père adoptif en lame braquée sur la gorge {mf|du|de la} Domin, tout comme Adalbert avant lui avait fait de son fils une arme. Ni l'un ni l'autre n'ont jamais eu peur de la mort. »

« Il n'avait que faire de survivre. Son seul et unique objectif était de tuer. Némésite a réussi à transformer son père adoptif en lame braquée sur la gorge de l'Enim, tout comme Adalbert avant lui avait fait de son fils une arme. Ni l'un ni l'autre n'ont jamais eu peur de la mort. »

languages.text: "Hayatta kalmak istemedi. Tek umudu ölmeni sağlamaktı. Nemezit üvey babasını direkt olarak Domin'in boğazını hedefleyen bir bıçağa dönüştürmeyi başarmış. Tıpkı Adalbert'in de bir zamanlar Nemezit'i bir silaha dönüştürdüğü gibi. Ölümden ikisi de korkmuyordu."
languages.original_text: "He did not want to survive. His only hope was to kill. Nemesite managed to turn his adoptive father into a blade pointed squarely at the Domin's throat, just as Adalbert himself had once turned Nemesite into a weapon. Neither of them feared death."
